title: Energy Learning Design for Adult Language Learners Using Emotion-Based e-Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Development of personalized e-learning environments to promote emotional engagement in adult learners, applying neuroscientific principles to energy-based language learning.

learning_goals: Learners maintain language learning motivation at over 80% using emotion-based learning tools
After establishing self-directed plans on e-learning platforms, learners perform learning activities at least twice weekly within three months
Learners achieve energy learning indicators (concentration, engagement) of 4.0/5.0 or higher in formative assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
